about_the_game:
The official soundtrack for Methods: The Canada Files. As the game is currently in early access, the soundtrack is not complete. Currently only the music from Files 01 - 03 of the game are included, and more tracks will be added in the future.

Composed by OddTillTheEnd.

"Illogicality", Piano Improvisation by Emanuele Filippi
"Sound of Mystery", "Theorycrafters", "Melodrama" Violin By Olha Iliashenko
"Theorycrafters", Percussion By Joni Strugo
"Refutation", Saxophone By Oleg Lavrentev
"Refutation", Drums by nicodrums
Accordion and Accordion Composition by Alex Somov

Tracks have been modified to have endings instead of looping.
